LanguageData.QE_CloningAbhorrent.label: Unethical
LanguageData.QE_CloningAbhorrent.description: Bringing new life into this world in a test tube is horrid, downright unethical.
LanguageData.QE_CloningApproved.label: Approved
LanguageData.QE_CloningApproved.description: Cloning is a velnerable task, bringing forth a new generation with great ease.
LanguageData.QE_CloningNeutral.label: Neutral
LanguageData.QE_CloningNeutral.description: Cloning is what it is. It is neither good, nor evil.
